summary: Provides a comprehensive experiment management layer for NeMo models, handling configuration validation, logger and checkpoint setup, timing callbacks, resume logic, and integration with Hydra and PyTorch Lightning. It defines custom exceptions for misconfigurations, implements a stateless timer, and offers utilities for log directory handling, SLURM detection, and checkpoint cleanup.
business_intent: Enable reliable, reproducible, and scalable training workflows by automating experiment tracking, checkpoint management, and resource-aware execution for deep learning projects.
